name: CBMPET - Boxing Champ (2013)
description:
Boxing Champ is an addictive boxing game that blends arcade gameplay with tactical elements.

Approach your opponent and find an opening, then attack him!

Game Features:

- Runs on all Commodore PET models (except 2001)
- Available on Tape and as Digital Download
- Large range of offense and defense moves
- Flickerfree gameplay
- Sound support
